name: MTLFunctionConstantValues
desc: A set of constant values used to specialize a graphics or compute function.

items.name: func setConstantValue(UnsafeRawPointer, type: MTLDataType, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets a value for a function constant at a specific index.

items.name: func setConstantValue(UnsafeRawPointer, type: MTLDataType, withName: String)
items.desc: Sets a value for a function constant with a specific name.

items.name: func setConstantValues(UnsafeRawPointer, type: MTLDataType, range: Range<Int>)
items.desc: Sets values for a group of function constants within a specific index range.

items.name: func reset()
items.desc: Deletes all previously set constant values.
